info.title: My API Documentation
info.description: Swagger OpenAPI documentation for Laravel API

post.description: Registers a user and returns a JWT token.

items.example: The email has already been taken.

post.description: Authenticate a user and return a Bearer token.
Invalidate the current user's access token and log them out.

get.description: Retrieve the current authenticated user's cart items. Requires a valid Bearer token.

put.description: Update the product to the authenticated user's cart. Requires a valid Bearer token.

post.description: Add a product to the authenticated user's cart. Requires a valid Bearer token.

delete.description: Remove a product from the authenticated user's cart. Requires a valid Bearer token.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: ID of the product to remove from cart

get.description: Retrieve a list of categories with their subcategories. Does not require authentication.
Retrieve the list of products belonging to a specific category. Does not require authentication.
Retrieve a list of all products with details including reviews. Does not require authentication.
Retrieve full details of a single product, including all images and reviews. Does not require authentication.
Retrieve all reviews for a specific product. Does not require authentication.

post.description: Add a review for a product. All parameters are in the request body: product_id, user_id, rating, review, title.

items.example: The selected user id is invalid.

get.description: Retrieve the list of products in the authenticated user's wishlist. Requires authentication.

post.description: Add a product to the authenticated user's wishlist. Requires product_id in the request body.

items.example: The selected product id is invalid.

delete.description: Remove a product from the authenticated user's wishlist. Requires product_id in the URL.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: ID of the product to remove from wishlist
